QuestData.Title: Send Them Running
QuestData.Description: Your scouts have located the saberon's alpha male just outside our gates!$B$BCommander, I believe that dispatching this target will send any of these remaining vermin running back to their caves.$B$BI do not wish to ask more of you, but you are the only one capable of this task, $gsir:ma'am;.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Vicegnaw just outside Vol'jin's Pride.
